name: Tophat Quest
description:
Tophat Quest is a pixel platformer story game (created solely by one person!) about a little purple man with a tophat named "Tophat", who goes on a quest to save the world!

  • Explore a colourful world full of funny, wacky, and interesting characters!
  • A short but sweet story, including bad guys and an even bigger bad boss!
  • Pixel Art graphics displayed on a virtual arcade-esque screen!
  • Lots of side content, including playable arcade machines!
  • Explore and play a Second Route after beating the main game!

Tophat ventures out into the Funny Fields one day, before meeting his friend; Blue! He proceeds to tell him about weird things going on in the Funky Forest, and suggests that Tophat should go and check it out! Thus, starting Tophat's Quest!

It isn't until later that Tophat meets a strange man and learns more about what's truly going on...
